<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/647a530b33d9d767f591159c24c62de48e57dad7|patch 8.2.0688: output clobbered if setting 'verbose' to see shell co…>
patch 8.2.0688: output clobbered if setting 'verbose' to see shell commands

Problem:    Output clobbered if setting 'verbose' to see shell commands.
Solution:   Only output "Searching for" when 'verbose' is 11 or higher.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0688: output clobbered if setting 'verbose' to see shell co… · vim/vim@647a530
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0688: output clobbered if setting 'verbose' to see shell co… · vim/vim@647a530
attachments.text: …mmands Problem: Output clobbered if setting 'verbose' to see shell commands. Solution: Only output "Searching for" when 'verbose' is 11 or higher.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a38b2b737e244eb2e4f199e070b05f86f4d433d4|patch 8.2.0689: when using getaddrinfo() the error message is unclear>
patch 8.2.0689: when using getaddrinfo() the error message is unclear

Problem:    When using getaddrinfo() the error message is unclear.
Solution:   Use gai_strerror() to get the message. (Ozaki Kiichi,
            closes #6034)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0689: when using getaddrinfo() the error message is unclear · vim/vim@a38b2b7

attachments.text: Problem: When using getaddrinfo() the error message is unclear. Solution: Use gai_strerror() to get the message. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6034)

patch 8.2.0690: line number of option set by modeline is wrong

Problem:    Line number of option set by modeline is wrong.
Solution:   Do not double the line number. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6035)

patch 8.2.0694: Haiku: channel and terminal do not work

Problem:    Haiku: channel and terminal do not work.
Solution:   Close files when the job has finished. (Ozaki Kiichi,
            closes #6039)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0694: Haiku: channel and terminal do not work · vim/vim@80a8d38
